channel.title: athletic compression – AT Surgical
channel.description: Manufacturers of Orthopedic Braces and Supports since 1975

item.title: Shin Protector Sleeve
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
• Sleeve with 3 mm gel polymer soft cushion pads moulded at the shin, protecting it from abrasion, friction, and pinching when practicing sports
  • Used under the socks with the pad either in contact to the skin or facing the sock
  • Washable and reusable

The post Shin Protector Sleeve appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded: The post Shin Protector Sleeve appeared first on AT Surgical.

item.title: Athletic Arm Compression Sleeves
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
The No Varix Sports Training Graduated Compression Arm Sleeves deliver performance enhancing compression to the front and back of the arms to increase blood circulation and provide muscle support during athletic training and recovery. The sleeves feature seamless gradient compression which provides wide ribbing in the front for bicep support and tight ribbing in the back and lower arm for triceps and forearm support.

The post Athletic Arm Compression Sleeves appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded:
The compression sleeve fabric is breathable and moisture wicking, allowing the garment and athlete to stay cool, dry and light during exertion. Developed by a professional athletic trainer, the compression leg sleeves are ideal for runners, cyclists, triathletes, and anyone else who is on their feet and would like to increase the blood flow to their arms.

  • Specially designed for increased muscle support during sports training for enhanced athletic performance.
  • Use for cycling, basketball, softball, baseball, football, soccer, volleyball, running, rugby, and other high intensity sports training.
  • A great choice for sports activities, travel or everyday use. Use on long flights to reduce uncomfortable leg and ankle swelling, cramping and minor variscosities
  • Pulls moisture from your skin, dries quickly and helps regulates skin temperature. Moisture-wicking fabric helps keep you cool, dry and ready for all-day action.

  • Learn more about the benefits of compression.

The post Athletic Arm Compression Sleeves appeared first on AT Surgical.

item.title: Knee Support for Running & More
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
This slip-on knee compression sleeve features a seamless Lycra blend fiber that gives in a gentle two-way stretch for comfortable, non-restrictive support using moderate compression. Compression aids more efficient circulation, which increases oxygenation and reduces muscle fatigue. Helps to alleviate swelling and inflammation, making it a great choice for sports activities, travel or everyday use. This knee sleeve can be worn in all weather conditions.

The post Knee Support for Running & More appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded:
AT Surgical’s Slip-On Knee Compression Sleeve aids in enhancing sports performance, endurance, and muscle recovery by providing support for distracting joint and muscle pain. A closed patella with a special knit design helps support the knee cap for greater stability and pain relief. Great for preventing and treating runner’s knee!

Use on long flights, while traveling or exercising to reduce uncomfortable leg and ankle swelling, cramping and minor variscosities. It also allows the muscles stay warm and limber, helping you to warm-up faster and work out longer with less muscle damage.

  • Get in the game faster and stay at your peak longer. Specially designed for increased knee support during sports training for enhanced athletic performance.
  • Use for cycling, basketball, softball, baseball, football, soccer, volleyball, running, rugby, walking and other high intensity sports training.
  • Machine washable on gentle cycle. Do not use bleach or fabric softeners.
  • Graduated ribbed compression around the patella the kneecap) gives you maximum support where you need it, and lighter compression where you don’t – resulting in a more comfortable fit
  • Moisture wicking fabric pulls moisture from your skin, dries quickly and helps regulates skin temperature – keeping you cool, dry and ready for all-day action.
  • Sold individually

Sizing

Small: 11″ & 1/2″ to 13″ | Medium: 13″ to 14 & 1/2″ | Large: 14 & 1/2″ to 16″ | XL: 16″ to 17 & 1/2″ | 2XL: 17 & 1/2″ to 19″

The post Knee Support for Running & More appeared first on AT Surgical.

item.title: Slip On Wrist Compression Sleeve
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
• Specially designed for increased wrist support during sports training for enhanced athletic performance
  • Use for cycling, basketball, softball, baseball, football, soccer, volleyball, running, rugby, walking and other high intensity sports training
  • These wrist sleeves can be worn in all weather conditions
  • Moisture wicking microfiber helps to keep the skin cool and dry
  • Machine washable on gentle cycle. Do not use bleach or fabric softeners
  • One sleeve per order

The post Slip On Wrist Compression Sleeve appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded:
Targeted compression reduces muscle oscillation and vibration upon contact, providing stability to the muscle to help prevent micro-trauma, resulting in a faster and easier recovery, while compression to the wrist gives the delicate joint area maximum support right where you need it, without being restrictive.

The Lycra blend fiber gives in a gentle two-way stretch for comfortable, non-restrictive support using moderate compression which aids more efficient circulation, increases oxygen and reduces muscle fatigue.

Wrist Circumference Brace Size
5.5″ – 6.5″ Small
6.5″ – 7.5″ Medium
7.5″ – 8.5″ Large
8.5″ – 9.5″ Extra Large
9.5″ – 10.5″ 2XL

Interested in the benefits of compression for athletes? Check out our page on compression!

The post Slip On Wrist Compression Sleeve appeared first on AT Surgical.

item.title: Shin and Achilles Protector Sleeve
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
The Achilles & Shin Gel Padding Sock is built to give you the most comfortable skiing and skating experience possible. The fabric is elastic, soft, and thin, taking less space inside the the boot and providing a highly breathable environment. Silicone padding around the tibia prevents discomfort that is commonly caused by ski and skate boots.

The post Shin and Achilles Protector Sleeve appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded:
• One per order
  • Toeless sock with 2mm gel polymer soft cushion pads molded to at both sides the tibia and Achilles, protecting them from abrasion, friction, and pinching when practicing sports
  • Specially indicated for ski and skate boots
  • Used under the socks with the pad either in contact to the skin or facing the sock
  • Washable and reusable
  • Two sizes

Size

U.S. Shoe Size

Euro Shoe Size

UK Shoe Size

Calf Circumference (Largest part of the calf)
S 4 – 8.5 34-37 2-4.5 11″-14.5″ (18-26.5 cm)
L 8.5 – 13 42-45 8-10.5 14.5″-18″ (37-45.5 cm)

 

Size

  • Cushions and protects the Achilles tendon by absorbing pressure and friction
  • Indicated to alleviate pain related Achilles tendonitis and bursitis, among other Achilles injuries
  • Washable and reusable

item.title: No Varix Athletic Compression Socks
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
The No Varix Sports Training Graduated Compression Socks will leave you cool, dry, comfortable and ready for action. Get in the game faster and stay at your peak longer. Specially designed for increased muscle support during sports training for enhanced athletic performance.Wick unwanted moisture away from the skin to the surface where it can be easily evaporated. The reinforced shape and arch work with the cushioned sole to provide extra leg support, increasing circulation and performance.

The post No Varix Athletic Compression Socks appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded:
Graduated ribbed compression gives you maximum support where you need it, and lighter compression where you don’t – resulting in a more comfortable fit. Lighter compression on the calves gradually increases to stronger compression in the ankle and arch regions for greater stability and comfort just where you need it. Increase blood circulation to the muscles while working out by reducing leg fatigue and effects of delayed onset muscle soreness in the days following strenuous exercise, allowing for improved athletic performance and faster recovery periods.

  • Use for cycling, basketball, softball, baseball, football, soccer, volleyball, running, rugby, and other high intensity sports training.
  • Helps to alleviate swelling and inflammation, making it a great choice for sports activities, travel or everyday use
  • Use on long flights to reduce uncomfortable leg and ankle swelling, cramping and minor variscosities
  • Made with closed toes, reinforced heels and a non-binding knit-in band to keep securely in place
  • Moisture-wicking fabric helps keep you cool, dry and ready for all-day action
  • These are black socks with an accent color. Accents available in Red, Green or Blue.

Interested in the benefits of compression for athletes? Check out our page on compression!

The post No Varix Athletic Compression Socks appeared first on AT Surgical.
